html:

Here's where to shop the exclusive collab, while it's still in stock.

Photo: Courtesy of Fabletics

Here's where to shop the exclusive collab, while it's still in stock.

Fabletics is teaming up with global music sensation Becky G for a dynamic new collaboration that blends high-performance activewear with bold, everyday style. Designed in Los Angeles — home to both Fabletics and Becky G — the 20-piece collection captures the vibrant city's energy while honoring Becky's Hispanic heritage. With versatile pieces that transition seamlessly from workouts to streetwear, this collection is made to empower women with confidence and style.

Curated by Becky G, the collection ensures a perfect balance of comfort, functionality, and cool factor. Standout pieces that seamlessly fit into any active women's wardrobe, include the HeatherFlex Kick Flare Jumpsuit, featuring a warm brushed feel, and the Iconic Bomber Jacket in Classic Black — two of Becky's favorite pieces.

For those who love bold colors, the collection also introduces a sculpted Seamless bra and legging set in a striking Heated Red hue, made with Fabletics' latest fabric technology for the ultimate fit and support.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

“Each piece is meant to bring forth a sense of bold confidence, whether walking down the street with your friends and family, or in a workout studio of your choice,” says the artist and Los Angeles native. Reflecting on her personal style and cultural roots, the collection was created to inspire women to embrace their individuality and strength in every aspect of their lives.

The Fabletics x Becky G collection is available now, bringing together the best of performance wear and everyday fashion in a way that feels fresh, powerful, and uniquely Los Angeles. Shop below now, exclusively at Fabletics.com.
